articles.author: Jessica Green
articles.title: Queen Camilla has opted for blue outfits to show 'reassured confidence', claims colour psychologist - Daily Mail
articles.description: The monarch's wife, 75, opted for the sapphire hues to show 'reassured confidence' as well as 'nobility', according to Lancashire-based colour psychologist Lee Chambers.
articles.content:
Queen Consort Camilla has sported blue ensembles since it was confirmed she would be known simply as 'Queen' once King Charles III is crowned at his coronation.
The monarch's wife, 75, opted for the… [+4110 chars]
